lead_paragraph: In a volatile area southwest of Kabul, the police on duty Monday morning appear to have sacked and burned their own station and then disappeared.
snippet: In a volatile area southwest of Kabul, the police on duty Monday morning appear to have sacked and burned their own station and then disappeared.

headline.main: Afghan Police Unit Defects to Taliban, Leaving Burning Station Behind
headline.seo: Afghan Police Unit Defects to Taliban
headline.print_headline: Afghan Police Unit Defects to Taliban, Leaving Burning Station Behind

byline.original: By DEXTER FILKINS and SHARIFULLAH SAHAK
byline.contributor: An Afghan employee of The New York Times contributed reporting from Helmand Province.
